name: get_weather
label: get_weather
description: Get the current weather in a given location

meta.name: get_weather
meta.description: Get the current weather in a given location

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: The unit of temperature, either 'celsius' or 'fahrenheit', use 'celcius' if not specified

location.title: Location
location.description: The city and state, e.g. San Francisco, CA
